title: Rank games with an AFK shouldn't make you lose LP
body:
As the title says - when you are in a ranked game and someone goes AFK for a certain % of time of the game, then it's unfair for people in that team to lose LP.

For some reason people are not only leaving games in norms but they also are doing it in ranked ( bronze, silver, gold and plat) - as a support main is already hard to find a good ADC, and now having to deal with people going AFK and losing LP because of that? completely unfair.... hopefully in the new ranked system they take that into consideration

replies.body: It comes down to abuse cases ultimately. Until the abuse cases can be mitigated at the very least, something like this will never happen, since the cost to players and to the overall health of matchmaking would be higher with such a thing in place than it is now.

yes i agree i have had this same problem i think riot made the surrender vote at 5mins due to afk but if someone afks after that its gg your LP i have also had net troubles and DC before game but i always come back say after 5mins and my team has not surrenderd i play a 40min game and my team win even though i dced at the start i loose LP even though i have reconected and helped the team to victory wish is unfair on my part as the team had multiple chances to surrender

Although I dont believe that you shouldn't lose any LP because of an AFK, I think more should be done about it. It sounds good in theory to not lose any LP as a result of an AFK, It can be highly abusable. Maybe another way to compensate for leavers ingame could be a reduced amount of LP lost or maybe an LP boost for the next game if you win. It's a very difficult situation to deal with for riot but I am still hopeful

Yeah, I know what you mean regarding abuse - a reduce LP lost could be good. I was thinking more on the lines of... if someone went AFK for more than 50% of the game-time then that's when this kicks in, and the person that leaves loses the full LP
